ingredients: +   1/2  ripe avocado,   +   1/4 cup mayonnaise, 2  ciabatta rolls, 1 tablespoon olive oil, divided, 2 slices provolone cheese, 1 cup whole fresh spinach leaves, divided,   +   1/4 pound thinly sliced mesquite smoked turkey breast, 2  roasted red peppers, sliced into strips
nutrition: Total Fat 51g 66%, Saturated Fat 13g 63%, Cholesterol 62mg 21%, Sodium 1720mg 75%, Total Carbohydrate 42g 15%, Dietary Fiber 6g 21%, Total Sugars 4g, Protein 25g, Vitamin C 59mg 297%, Calcium 328mg 25%, Iron 4mg 23%, Potassium 623mg 13%
